title: I cant move on game, everygame at min 3-4 (lane phase)
body: So I wonder If anyone else is having the same problem, I am writing this a bit tilted since its been a week with the problem, I already repaired client but nothing changed, I find this problem weird and I dont know if it's my conex or the client but why always at that minut, after I restart modem I can comeback to the game (most of the times I die because my opponent kills me...) I had to stop ranking and I tried to be patient but I am done with the problem, anyone else have/had the same experience? thanks for reading (y){{champion:84}}

replies.body: It's hard to say what's causing this issue, if it's something failing to render or a connection issue.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) test of these matches to see if you might be experiencing network problems like packet loss, which can cause issues like input not responding.  Also, if you have Windows 10, disable the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which has been known to cause similar problems.  Let me know!

First: Thanks for answeing and taking your time!
I dont have Windows 10, I just ran the log reader: Your average ping was 115 milliseconds.

The worst ping you experienced was 283ms. This means you experienced high ping during this game, which is likely where you were seeing issues. See below for a few recommendations to help out with this

Your average percentage of packet loss for this game was 2.05%.

Overall, this means you had a high amount of packets lost during the game. This can be caused by various network issues, so please see below for a few common steps that can help reduce packet loss. {{champion:84}}  {{summoner:4}}
I still have the same problem and I can't find any solution :(
Seems like this forums are not the place to solve this kind of problems, wich have apparently no solutions aswell, time to quit league
